awards.name: Most Ferocious
awards.description: Awarded to the most fearsome creature

awards.name: Most Elusive
awards.description: Awarded to the hardest to spot creature

awards.name: Cutest Threat
awards.description: Awarded to the most adorable yet dangerous creature

awards.name: Best Camouflage
awards.description: Awarded for the most effective use of natural disguise

awards.name: Loudest Roar
awards.description: Awarded to the creature with the most powerful vocalization

awards.name: Fastest Striker
awards.description: Awarded for the most rapid attack ability

awards.name: Most Bizarre
awards.description: Awarded to the creature with the most unusual traits

awards.name: Supreme Swimmer
awards.description: Awarded to the best aquatic performer

awards.name: Sky Emperor
awards.description: Awarded to the dominant airborne species

awards.name: Most Loyal
awards.description: Awarded for unparalleled loyalty or group bonding

awards.name: Master of Escape
awards.description: Awarded to the best evader under threat

awards.name: Biggest Biter
awards.description: Awarded for jaw strength and biting impact

awards.name: Most Radioactive
awards.description: Awarded to creatures with high energy emissions or traits

awards.name: Best Glow
awards.description: Awarded to the most visually radiant animal
